items.title: Kodular - No Code App CreatorÂ
items.summary: Interested in Making Android App or have a good idea, but don't know to code. Don't worry we got you a new toy !!Â KodularÂ - A Modern App Creator, is a Distribution ofÂ MIT App Inventor. A Blocky based Android App Development Platform. Developing Applications is as…
items.content_html:
Interested in Making Android App or have a good idea, but don't know to code. Don't worry we got you a new toy !!
Â 

Starting here is so simple, just head to their homepage, click onÂ Create AppsÂ and log in using any desired option. It will take you to Kodular Creator. Where you will turn Ideas to Apps. There click onÂ create new project, a pop-up will appear enter your project name then configure your project setting and click on Finish and Congratulations your Project is Created ğŸ¥³

Now as your project is created, let's see how to use the Creator. When your Project is Opened, you will see an Interface for creating apps called Designer. Where it has Component Platte at Left an Android Device Mockup at Center and a Properties tab at Right along with some Buttons in the top menu.

â€ŒI personally recommend and use Kodular for Creating Professional Applications. I am also Available onÂ Kodular CommunityÂ and had Published Several Basic/Advance Guides for Kodular. You can also ask your Issue/Query there. The Kodular Community is One of the best and Active Community in all AI2 Distros. The Users and Staff there are so helpful and give their best to give you the solution to your problem.

Here are Some Recommendations for Getting Started.
Â 
  • Kaffeine TV
  • Kodular
  • Pixii Bomb

Hope this article helped you to gain some new and Interesting Information, if so then share this to your Family and Friends also.

Have Questions about this article or another, Join ourÂ LOGYC RealmÂ on telegram and ask your doubts.

Â 

Happy Koding

Peace â˜®ï¸

I saw many user requesting for an method to do use Circular progress to Show Download Progress

  1. Set an Arrangement Where the Ring will be Created.

items.title: Create Multiple (Unlimited) Webview/Tabs Dynamically | Guide
items.summary: Create/Remove/Switch WebviewFollow the below steps to create/Tabs Webviews Dynamically Id- For Assigning a Unique Id for Each webview Url- Urlâ€™s for Webview.Â *You can add textbox to enter Desired Url This Procedure will be used to switch the visibility of Webviews. Webview will br created Dynamically.
items.content_html:
• Create/Remove/Switch Webview

Follow the below steps to create/Tabs Webviews Dynamically

1. Components




2. Blocks

  • Variables

Id- For Assigning a Unique Id for Each webview

Url- Urlâ€™s for Webview.Â *You can add textbox to enter Desired Url

  • Procedure

This Procedure will be used to switch the visibility of Webviews.

  • Create Webview/Tabs

Webview will br created Dynamically. All the blocks should be in same order.

Create webview- Webview is created using a Unique Id.

Visibility (Procedure) - Currently created webview is set to visible.

Set webview - currently created webview is set as active so all the properties,events will be related to current webview.

  • Switch Webview/Tabs

A List Picker will visible with a list all available webview. Selected Webview will be visible.

  • Remove Webview/Tabs

Â 

Â 
A List Picker will visible with a list all available webview. Selected Webview will be removed.

If all the webview will be removed then all the values will be reset.

Â 

Download :

Apk:CreepyApricotLeopard.apkÂ (5.2 MB)
Aia:CreepyApricotLeopard.aiaÂ (62.7 KB)

Refrences :

Custom Webview ByÂ @vknow360

Â 
Â CustomWebView : An extended form of Web Viewer Extensions

By Using your own logic this can be customised to a better design. This is just a refrence to how to dynamically create webviews.

Thanks Kodular For a great Platform.Â 

Happy KodingÂ 

Peace â˜®ï¸
